title: All 32 - Baltimore Ravens: Building everything around Lamar Jackson with Garrett Downing (Football 6/24)
description:
Finally! It's our much-anticipated and long-awaited/overdue 'All 32' episode on the Ravens. Garrett Downing of Ravens.com joins Will Brinson to discuss how the team has boldly built around Lamar Jackson (2:00), if last year's regular season is repeatable (4:30), as well as their running back situation (9:00). They then shift focus to the defense (11:45) and season outlook.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @gdowning14
Produced by: @E_DeBerardinis
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: All 32 - Baltimore Ravens: Building everything around Lamar Jackson with Garrett Downing (Football 6/24)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: The Ravens won't catch anyone by surprise this year, but they can still remain one of the NFL's best. Garrett Downing of ravens.com joins the pod for insight on the team.
